title: My People Were Fair and Had Sky in Their Hair... But Now They're Content to Wear Stars on Their Brows
summary: My People Were Fair and Had Sky in Their Hair... But Now They're Content to Wear Stars on Their Brows is the debut album by psychedelic folk band Tyrannosaurus Rex (later known as T. Rex). It was released on 5 July 1968 by record label Regal Zonophone.
